titleStmt.title: The credit of Yorkeshire, or The glory of the north, or, A new way to pay the malt-man. To the tune of The right glory of the west.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Charles, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Burton at the Horse-shoo in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Of late I heard a dity ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
At head of second part: The second part, to the same tune.
Imperfect: mutilated and faded, affecting some text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
